desc:
• Refined the website and fixed the bugs utilizing PHP for the backend development and MySQL for the database management.
  • Improved the website's lighthouse performance by 3%, accessibility by 1%, best practices by 1%, and SEO by 2%.
  • Linked local with remote using Filezilla and connect to FTP servers to transfer files and handle queries using phpMyAdmin.

• Made thorough research on different startups, designed brochures and pitch decks, and analyzed various funding rounds.
  • Worked on the project to connect with startups to assist them in funding, networking, business strategies and pitch deck.
  • Responsible for the coordination and management of the collaboration with E-Cell of different colleges across India.
